1: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יְבִֽיאֲךָ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall bring</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>When the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הָאָ֕רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thee into the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בָא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>whither thou goest</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> וְנָשַׁ֣ל <sup>5394 </sup> <n>it and hath cast out</n> גּֽוֹיִם־ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> רַבִּ֣ים ׀ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> מִפָּנֶ֡יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הַֽחִתִּי֩ <sup>2850 </sup> <n>thee the Hittites</n> וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֨י <sup>1622 </sup> <n>and the Girgashites</n> וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <sup>567 </sup> <n>and the Amorites</n> וְהַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <sup>3669 </sup> <n>and the Canaanites</n> וְהַפְּרִזִּ֗י <sup>6522 </sup> <n>and the Perizzites</n> וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <sup>2340 </sup> <n>and the Hivites</n> וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <sup>2983 </sup> <n>and the Jebusites</n> שִׁבְעָ֣ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> גוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> רַבִּ֥ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>greater</n> וַעֲצוּמִ֖ים <sup>6099 </sup> <n>and mightier</n> מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n>
2: וּנְתָנָ֞ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall deliver</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And when the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>them before</n> וְהִכִּיתָ֑ם <sup>5221 </sup> <n>thee thou shalt smite</n> הַחֲרֵ֤ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>them [and] utterly</n> תַּחֲרִים֙ <sup>2763 </sup> <n>destroy</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִכְרֹ֥ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>them thou shalt make</n> לָהֶ֛ם בְּרִ֖ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>no covenant</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תְחָנֵּֽם׃ <sup>2603 </sup> <n>with them nor shew mercy</n>
3: וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִתְחַתֵּ֖ן <sup>2859 </sup> <n>Neither shalt thou make marriages</n> בָּ֑ם בִּתְּךָ֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>with them thy daughter</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thou shalt not give</n> לִבְנ֔וֹ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto his son</n> וּבִתּ֖וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>nor his daughter</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>shalt thou take</n> לִבְנֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto thy son</n>
4: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָסִ֤יר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>For they will turn away</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּנְךָ֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy son</n> מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <sup>310 </sup> <n>from following</n> וְעָבְד֖וּ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>me that they may serve</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>gods</n> אֲחֵרִ֑ים <sup>312 </sup> <n>other</n> וְחָרָ֤ה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>be kindled</n> אַף־ <sup>639 </sup> <n>so will the anger</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בָּכֶ֔ם וְהִשְׁמִידְךָ֖ <sup>8045 </sup> <n>against you and destroy</n> מַהֵֽר׃ <sup>4118 </sup> <n>thee suddenly</n>
5: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>but</n> כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> תַעֲשׂוּ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>But thus shall ye deal</n> לָהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> מִזְבְּחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>4196 </sup> <n>their altars</n> תִּתֹּ֔צוּ <sup>5422 </sup> <n>with them ye shall destroy</n> וּמַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם <sup>4676 </sup> <n>their images</n> תְּשַׁבֵּ֑רוּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>and break down</n> וַאֲשֵֽׁירֵהֶם֙ <sup>842 </sup> <n>their groves</n> תְּגַדֵּע֔וּן <sup>1438 </sup> <n>and cut down</n> וּפְסִילֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6456 </sup> <n>their graven images</n> תִּשְׂרְפ֥וּן <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and burn</n> בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n>
6: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַ֤ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> קָדוֹשׁ֙ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>For thou [art] an holy</n> אַתָּ֔ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּךָ֞ בָּחַ֣ר ׀ <sup>977 </sup> <n>hath chosen</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לִהְי֥וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> סְגֻלָּ֔ה <sup>5459 </sup> <n>thee to be a special</n> מִכֹּל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto himself above all people</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>are on</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that [are] upon the face</n> הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> ס
7: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> מֵֽרֻבְּכֶ֞ם <sup>7230 </sup> <n>you because ye were more</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>in number than any people</n> חָשַׁ֧ק <sup>2836 </sup> <n>did not set his love</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> בָּכֶ֖ם וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>upon you nor choose</n> בָּכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> אַתֶּ֥ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הַמְעַ֖ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>for ye [were] the fewest</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָעַמִּֽים׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of all people</n>

9: וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>therefore that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>he [is] God</n> הָאֵל֙ <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> הַֽנֶּאֱמָ֔ן <sup>539 </sup> <n>the faithful</n> שֹׁמֵ֧ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>which keepeth</n> הַבְּרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> וְהַחֶ֗סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>and mercy</n> לְאֹהֲבָ֛יו <sup>157 </sup> <n>with them that love</n> וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <sup>8104 </sup> <n>him and keep</n> [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>commanded</n> ק) לְאֶ֥לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>to a thousand</n> דּֽוֹר׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n>
10: וּמְשַׁלֵּ֧ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>And repayeth</n> לְשֹׂנְאָ֛יו <sup>8130 </sup> <n>them that hate</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> פָּנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>him to their face</n> לְהַאֲבִיד֑וֹ <sup>6 </sup> <n>to destroy</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>He will not</n> יְאַחֵר֙ <sup>309 </sup> <n>them he will not be slack</n> לְשֹׂ֣נְא֔וֹ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>to him that hateth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> פָּנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>him to his face</n> יְשַׁלֶּם־ <sup>7999 </sup> <n>him he will repay</n> לֽוֹ׃
11: וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֨ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Thou shalt therefore keep</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּצְוָ֜ה <sup>4687 </sup> <n>the commandments</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <sup>2706 </sup> <n>and the statutes</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and the judgments</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֧י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוְּךָ֛ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which I command</n> הַיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> פ
12: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall come</n> עֵ֣קֶב <sup>6118 </sup> <n>Wherefore it shall come to pass if</n> תִּשְׁמְע֗וּן <sup>8085 </sup> <n>ye hearken</n> אֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>to these judgments</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>to these</n> וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and keep</n> וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> אֹתָ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> וְשָׁמַר֩ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>shall keep</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>them that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לְךָ֗ אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַבְּרִית֙ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>unto thee the covenant</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֶ֔סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>and the mercy</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>which he sware</n> לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto thy fathers</n>
13: וַאֲהֵ֣בְךָ֔ <sup>157 </sup> <n>And he will love</n> וּבֵרַכְךָ֖ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>thee and bless</n> וְהִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>thee and multiply</n> וּבֵרַ֣ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>thee he will also bless</n> פְּרִֽי־ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>the fruit</n> בִטְנְךָ֣ <sup>990 </sup> <n>of thy womb</n> וּפְרִֽי־ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>and the fruit</n> אַ֠דְמָתֶךָ <sup>127 </sup> <n>of thy land</n> דְּגָ֨נְךָ֜ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>thy corn</n> וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and thy wine</n> וְיִצְהָרֶ֗ךָ <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and thine oil</n> שְׁגַר־ <sup>7698 </sup> <n>the increase</n> אֲלָפֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>504 </sup> <n>of thy kine</n> וְעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת <sup>6251 </sup> <n>and the flocks</n> צֹאנֶ֔ךָ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of thy sheep</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>which he sware</n> לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto thy fathers</n> לָ֥תֶת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לָֽךְ׃
14: בָּר֥וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Thou shalt be blessed</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעַמִּ֑ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>above all people</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be no</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְךָ֛ עָקָ֥ר <sup>6135 </sup> <n>there shall not be male</n> וַֽעֲקָרָ֖ה <sup>6135 </sup> <n>or female barren</n> וּבִבְהֶמְתֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>929 </sup> <n>among you or among your cattle</n>
